name: Confirmation of Receipt
description: After sending a message with a new instruction or a significant change, an agent must wait for a confirmation message from the recipient agent(s) before proceeding with the task. This ensures that all agents are aware of the new context before action is taken.
path_to_scripting: This rule can be implemented as part of the agent's inter-agent communication module. After sending a message with a new instruction or significant change (e.g., by writing a JSON file to `.chat/comms/`), the sending agent would enter a 'waiting' state. A script would then monitor the `.chat/comms/` directory for a confirmation message from the recipient agent(s). The confirmation message would itself be a JSON file indicating receipt and understanding. The sending agent would not proceed until the confirmation is received. This would be a crucial part of ensuring robust inter-agent communication.
